original_text:
Why did you stay among the sheep pens
    to hear the whistling for the flocks?
In the districts of Reuben
    there was much searching of heart.
korean_text: 네가 양의 우리 가운데에 앉아서 목자의 피리 부는 소리를 들음은 어찌 됨이냐 르우벤 시냇가에서 큰 결심이 있었도다

sentences.original_text: Why did you stay among the sheep pens
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 어찌하여 양 우리 가운데 머물렀느냐

sentences.original_text: to hear the whistling for the flocks?
sentences.korean_translation: 떼를 부르는 피리 소리를 들으려고 하느냐

sentences.original_text: there was much searching of heart.
